reviews.review:
게임의 재미에는 여러가지가 있지만 그중 가장 원초적인 것은 경쟁, 문제해결, 목표달성 등에 따른 성취감이라고 생각합니다.

포탈2는 문제해결에 따른 성취감을 가득 느낄 수 있는 게임입니다. 퍼즐은 전작보다 더욱 잘 짜여지고 다양해져 풀어가는 재미가 있었고, 매력적인 캐릭터와 전작에서 이어지는 충격적인 스토리 덕분에 단순히 퍼즐만을 반복할 때 생기는 지루함이 전혀 느껴지지 않았습니다.

순수하게 이리저리 생각하고 시도해보며 퍼즐을 풀어내는 성취감을 원하신다면, 복잡한 스토리나 캐릭터육성이 아닌 게임의 원초적인 재미 - 문제해결의 재미를 돌이켜보고 싶다면 포탈2를 추천합니다.

Подобной Portal игры в таком жанре: как игры-головоломки с элементами экшена и адвенчуры нет! Браво Valvе, да еще во вселенной Half-Life!!))

Сначала кажется ничё так игра, бегаешь себе, падаешь куда-то, круглая штука разговаривает. Но тут как давай дыры в пространстве открываться. А где это видано, чтобы вот так вот пространство дырявилось? Оно так если и может быть, то только от лукавого. В общем, если вздумаете играть, в дыры не лезьте. Прямо вот так и скажите круглому "Не полезу в эту дыру и всё тут!"

안 그래도 명작이었던 게임이 2를 붙이고 두배로 더 멋지게 돌아왔다.

Gameplay: Extremely well done puzzles, though some are a tad easy. Great physics engine. The story is pretty funny also. Expect to get stuck at some points and have to sit back and examine the whole room. Great replayability via coop and steam workshop, some of the puzzles are even better than valves. 10/10 
Graphics: Awesome graphics although sometimes the puzzle solutions are a bit hard to see. Very futuristic feel. 10/10 
Overall: Great experience especially if your played the first one. The ending and the story are worth one playthrough. Just like most other valve games this is quality. 10/10

The sequel to the popular Orange Box title Portal, Portal 2 not only lives up to its predecessor's expectations, it destroys them. The game is ten times longer than the original, and the story is well-written including smart humour the first game was known for.

Portal 2's plot takes place an unspecified time after the events of Portal. Chell makes her way through old, rotting test chambers of Aperture that bring back a hint of nostalgia from the first game as she is accompanied by her chatty friend Wheatly, a personality core. Soon Chell and Wheatly meet GLaDOS again and all hell breaks loose as Chell is tossed into the underbelly of Aperture Laboratories where she is forced to scratch and claw her way to the surface in order to survive and prevent the lab from melting down. Along the way Chell learns about Aperture Laboratories' shady past, possible hints about her past, and many more secrets.

Portal 2 is a crescendo of comedy, tragedy, and challenging puzzles that takes pages out of the legend of Prometheus. Combined, all these elements make an incredibly smart, tough, and funny masterpiece of a game that should be experienced by all.

Portal 2 is the only game I have played start to finish without stopping and every frustrating second was worth it. I could not recommend this game enough; check it out.

I bet it was hard to follow up such a well-received game, but Valve did a great job. The story is great from start to finish, and the co-op campaign is really fun to play through with a friend. Community maps are also great to search through.

Продолжение нашумевшей Portal. Улучшено всё, что нуждалось в доработке, сохранён стиль, шарм и внешний вид игры. Присутствует немаловажное нововведение - мультиплеер. На протяжении кооперативной кампании, вы с напарником - два робота, спроектированные GlaDOS - будете расширять знания о возможностях порталов и о самой лоборатории Aperture.

Que si pim, que si pam, que si pum. Pones un portal aquí, otro allí y !magia!
Este juego te hace ver los videojuegos de otra manera, sobre todo el Portal que es una verdadera sorpresa. El Portal 2 en general mantiene esa sorpresa pero mejor llevada a cabo, una muy buena pelea final, donde tendrás que poner en práctica todo lo aprendido, la introduccion de un modo coop que es realmente divertido, las coñas de los personajes y del propio juego, los easter eggs...
En fin, este juego es una maravilla para quien lo sepa apreciar.
It's Portal.... what else to say? It features a nice single-player campaign and an even better co-op-mode. The community is very alive and there are tons of custom maps available. A must-have!

С какой стороны не подойди эту игру мне хочется расхвалить до большого космического синего экрана, ни одного промаха! Хотя нет, есть одна неувязка. Её катострофически мало! Вереница пространственных головоломок наполненных ироничными репликами GLaDOS и расчётливым оптимизмом Уитли закончились не успев я разыграться. Вероятно это был самый восхитительный набор тестовых камер в моей жизни, рекомендую всем независимо от предпочтений.

Portal 2 is another great installment in valve's list of games. Portal 2 takes a whole new dimension from the previous game which used the half-life 2 engine. Portal 2 is not just another game you would expect from anyother game it is a mind-blowing FPS puzzle solving game with a new game engine from valve. Portal 2 has a lot of great levels, great graphics, great story, and best of all great gameplay. Portal 2 is a fantastic game and is replayable guranteed. Valve has done it yet again with making a memorable expierience in gaming ever since the first half-life game was released. So if you want a great FPS puzzle solver buy portal 2 now!

Videojuego que todo el mundo debería jugar, sea o no amante del mundillo. Cuidado de forma minuciosa para ofrecer al jugador una experiencia donde jugabilidad, trama y personajes giran al unísono en pos de pincelar una Aperture Science que grita con voz propia y parece cobrar vida por momentos. Portal 2 es la perfecta prueba de que las segundas partes no siempre son malas, logrando con creces ofrecer un gameplay sólido, unos personajes carismáticos y repletos de matices y contrastes, adornadon todo lo anterior con un guion que invita al jugador a fijarse en los pequeños detalles y en la importancia de todo aquello que no se muestra en pantalla.

Portal 2 es de esas obras que rompen con lo establecido y consiguen desmarcarse de lo común dentro de un mundillo donde cada vez más prima la continuidad y la sobreexplotación de ideas recicladas. 100% recomendado.

Reviews for the Deaf and Hard of Hearing
---

With regard to accessibility for deaf/hoh gamers, I give Portal 2 a 10/10.

Gameplay
The only issues that come up with Portal 2 are with the multiplayer.  In single player, there are no problems since captions exist.  Multiplayer games are goal-oriented and require coordinated efforts.  The game allows coordination through a ping tool that drops a marker where you're looking that the other player can see.

Subtitles/Text
The game is fully captioned, so deaf/hoh can play single player effectively without missing anything.  Multiplayer games do not require subtitles.

Chatting/Communicating
You can use text chat in multiplayer games to augment the ping tool.

This game is a game that definitely is worth playing!

The continued story from the first Portal game is deepened in this sequel and it keeps getting better and better the more you play! Awesome plot twists and amazing puzzles! 

The co-op game is super fun as well! The possibility of bounding with your science partner through various gestures is honestly the greatest! Also the possibility of downloading user-chambers from the workshop makes the fun last even longer!

All in all, if you buy this game buy it for the main story! It is rarely I play a game which I fall in love with this much! Wonderful character development and plot! 

And also, the cake is still a lie! Or is it?
